name: Filo Corner Radius System
description: Consistent corner radius scale for all Filo apps

01.usage: Small radius - buttons, inputs, small cards

04.usage: Extra large radius - feature cards, hero elements

pill.usage: Pill shape - single-line cells, tags, chips, tab bars

rules.singleLineCell: Always use pill (999) for single-line content cells
rules.multiLineCell: Use radius-1 (16) or radius-2 (20) for multi-line cells
rules.nestedRadius: Inner radius should be smaller than outer radius
